com.ryanbrooks.expandablerecyclerview.Model

Interface ParentObject


  • public interface ParentObject
    Interface for implementing required methods in a ParentObject

    In the user's specified ParentObject, they should set instance variables for the following:

    boolean mExpanded: for the Parent's current expanded state Object (or the user's custom ChildObject type) mChildObject: the reference to the Parent's ChildObject long mStableId: A unique long to properly identify the ParentObject from other ParentObjects

    Since:
    5/27/2015

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getChildObject()
      Getter method object to the reference to this ParentObject's child
      long getStableId()
      Getter method for the unique id associated with this ParentObject The id is used by the Adapter to handle expansion and should be unique to only this ParentObject
      boolean isExpanded()
      Getter method for the current expansion state of this ParentObject
      void setChildObject(java.lang.Object childObject)
      Setter method for this parent's child object
      void setExpanded(boolean expanded)
      Setter method for setting the current expansion state.
      void setStableId(long stableId)
      Setter method for the unique id associated with this ParentObject The user must handle generating this unique id

    • Method Detail

      • isExpanded

        boolean isExpanded()
        Getter method for the current expansion state of this ParentObject
        Returns:
        true for currently expanded, false for currently collapsed

      • setExpanded

        void setExpanded(boolean expanded)
        Setter method for setting the current expansion state. For expanded, the value should be set to true. For collapsed, the value should be set to false.
        Parameters:
        expanded -

      • getChildObject

        java.lang.Object getChildObject()
        Getter method object to the reference to this ParentObject's child
        Returns:
        this Parent's child object

      • setChildObject

        void setChildObject(java.lang.Object childObject)
        Setter method for this parent's child object
        Parameters:
        childObject -

      • getStableId

        long getStableId()
        Getter method for the unique id associated with this ParentObject The id is used by the Adapter to handle expansion and should be unique to only this ParentObject
        Returns:
        the unique id associated only with this ParentObject

      • setStableId

        void setStableId(long stableId)
        Setter method for the unique id associated with this ParentObject The user must handle generating this unique id
        Parameters:
        stableId -
